a.title: EL in Action: First Grade Animal Research Projects

p.a: EL in Action: First Grade Animal Research Projects

div.p: Hello and welcome to education at 10,200 feet above sea level! We are glad you are interested in our school district. From becoming an Expeditionary Learning district to opening a new, $26 million dollar high school, we have many exciting things happening in our schools, and we are happy to share them with you. Please contact me anytime with questions, comments or input about our work.
Superintendent Wendy Wyman
We're listening! Send Wendy an email at wwyman@lakecountyschools.net or call her at 719-486-6800. You may also submit a comment using our Contact Us form.

div.div: Lake County School District knows how important good nutrition is for your student's growing mind and body, so we offer a free, healthy breakfast at the beginning of every day, in every classroom, at every K-12 school.

div.p:
Students: approx 1,000
K-12 Certified Teachers: 76
K-12 Support Staff: 87
12 Years Avg Experience
61% with Master's Degree
Schools:
1 Preschool
2 Elementary Schools
1 High School (7th-12th)
Area Served: 383.90 square miles
